name: Patagonia: Journey to the Amazon Rainforest
name_original: Patagonia: Journey to the Amazon Rainforest
description:
This game is part of an academic project for Fontys ACI's "Transmedia Storytelling" course (2020 4P), and was made for the purpose of telling a fictional and emotional story to promote the Patagonia brand's work.

Thank you so much for playing!

Team: Haydée Velasquez, Joy Vidal and Juliana Müller.
